channel.description:
[img]http://i.imgur.com/1zQ6rEA.png[/img]
LINKS -------- [url=http://www.rune-energy.com/Rune-Energy.jar]Client Download[/url] [url=http://www.rune-energy.com]Rune-Energy Home page[/url] [url=http://www.rune-energy.com/forum]Rune-Energy Forum[/url] [url=http://www.rune-energy.com/vote]Rune-Energy Vote[/url] ------------------------------------------------- Rune Energy Futures! ---------------------------- Rune Energy Features! ---------------------------- [u][b]*317 loading 637 *24/7 VPS Uptime[/b][/u]
*Full Jad - 63Waves *Donator benefits/Area *Working gambling *Working duel arena *Working duo/solo slayer *Working moneypouch *Working XPCounter *Working banktabs *Few customs *Crystal Keys *Perfect PVM *All skills working *Nex items *Chaotics *Working DFS Special *Perfect Summoning *Perfect Clue Scrolls [Instant reward] *Perfect PVP *Making overloads *Title system *Auto Donate/Vote *IPB forum *Different point systems *Dwarf Cannon *Monster/Minigame/PK/Skilling/Bossing/Donator Teles.
[b]*Skilling[/b] - Attack - Strength - Defence - Range - Prayer - Magic - Runecrafting - Dungeoneering [In the making] - Hitpoints - Agility - Herblore - Thieving - Crafting - Fletching - Slayer - Hunter - Mining - Smithing - Fishing - Cooking - Firemaking - Woodcutting - Farming - Summoning
[b]*Bosses[/b] - All dragons - Corporal Beast - Nomad - Tormented Demons - Avatar of Destruction - GodWars - Kalphite Queen - Barrelchests - Chaos Elemental - Revenants - Dagganoths - Strykewurms - Plain Freezer
[b]*Minigames [ALL WORKING][/b] - Barrows - Fight caves - Fight pits - Blast furnace - Pest Control - Castle Wars - Duel Arena
Join Rune-Energy today! Ofcourse, it is impossible to list all the features, so why don't you come to check it out?! The most important thing of a server is having a warm community, which we certainly have!

item.description:
@killa_kronic wrote:

You should work on your advertisement page because it looks bad, add more pictures because people like to see a nice 9-10 pictures and also take pictures of other features on the server. Not a cannon…

However after playing the server and taking a look. Its a very nice design with the interfaces in the teleportation tab. That is pretty nice on how you do that. I feel like this server has poteinal but please clean up your thread or make it a lot better.
